activities:
Sisley is a French company that creates and distributes skincare and make-up products, along with very fine perfumes. Sisley products are marketed in over 80 countries on all five continents. Sisley controls the major part of its distribution through a network of around thirty subsidiaries, with over 80 percent of its revenues generated from exports. The majority of Sisley’s products are manufactured in France, mainly in its Blois plant, while its Research and Development laboratories are located just outside Paris. 
As a global company, Sisley shares information between its subsidiaries and the corporate office based in France.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
